name: Juan Guillermo Llanos
body:
![](https://www.sc.fsu.edu/images/people/jgl10.jpg)

### About me
I am a 2nd year Computational Science graduate student in the Computational Intelligence Lab at the [FSU Department of Scientific Computing](https://www.sc.fsu.edu/). I'm advised by [Professor Gordon Erlebacher](http://people.sc.fsu.edu/~gerlebacher/). I plan to carry out research in Machine Learning. In particular, I am interested in Deep Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Memory, Video Games, and their intersection.
